column5: Looking for folks who have been up to Sportman's Lodge on Little Vermillion in Ontario. We are thinking of trying this place next year and were wondering what you could tell us about the fishing, accomodations, staff and such. Any information would be greatly appreciated. Thanks! Ken:P
You might want to ask on www.ontariofishing.net A gentleman by the handle of TennesseeGuy has some superb and extensive experience with Sportsman Lodge.
